Content:: Ten Ready Rifles (Spanish: Diez fusiles esperan) is a 1959 Spanish drama film directed by José Luis Sáenz de Heredia. The film concerns the Carlist Wars of the 19th century.[1] It was entered into the 9th Berlin International Film Festival.[2] This article related to a Spanish film of the 1950s is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
